title.rendered: There’s Something Wrong. How Can I Get Help?

content.rendered:
We’re sorry to hear! The fastest way to get in contact with us is to submit a bug report or support ticket. 

To ask for help, open the app navigation menu located in the upper right-hand corner of your device. 

Then tap on “Need Help”. From here you will be brought to the Dumpster ‘Help Centre’. Simply click on the mail icon on the top right hand corner of the screen & submit your request.

Please be as descriptive as possible so we can analyze and address the problem ASAP.
